org.apache.rat.mp

Class AbstractRatMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.apache.rat.plugin.BaseRatMojo
        • org.apache.rat.mp.AbstractRatMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RatCheckMojo, RatReportMojo

    public abstract class AbstractRatMojo
extends BaseRatMojo
    Abstract base class for Mojos, which are running Rat.

    • Field Summary

      • setExclude

        @Parameter(property="rat.exclude")
public void setExclude(String exclude)
        Description copied from class: BaseRatMojo
        Excludes files matching wildcard <Expression>. May be followed by multiple arguments. Note that '--' or a following option is required when using this parameter.
        Overrides:

      • setExcludesFile

        @Deprecated
 @Parameter(property="rat.excludesFile")
public void setExcludesFile(String excludeFile)
        Deprecated. use excludeFile
        Specifies a file, from which to read excludes. Basically, an alternative to specifying the excludes as a list. The excludesFile is assumed to be using the UFT8 character set.
